1.page_content: <content><heading>FAQ QUESTIONS:</heading><section><subheading>CUSTOMER FAQs</subheading></section><heading>1.   What is VOOMA  ?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="10.499999999999943">VOOMA   is a mobile wallet service  that enables you as a customer to Send money to other</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Segoe UI" size="9.959999999999923">VOOMA   customers, and other mobile wallets(M-PESA and T-Kash )bank account and much</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Segoe UI" size="9.959999999999923">more. VOOMA   will also offer savings and loans..</paragraph></section><heading>2.   What is required to register on VOOMA  ?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">The following valid Kenyan government issued Identification documents:</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.040000000000001">   National ID</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999964">   Kenyan Passport</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.040000000000001">   A registered mobile subscriber *Safaricom, Airtel, Telkom *</paragraph></section><heading>3.   How do I get to register on VOOMA  ?</heading><section><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   Dial *844# and follow the simple steps or,</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   Download the KCB App and register or,</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   You can also register at a KCB Agent</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   KCB Branches</paragraph></section><heading>4.   Is there a cost of registration?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">No, registration is free.</paragraph></section><heading>5.   What services can I get on VOOMA  ?</heading><section><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   Send money</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   Pay bills</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   Buy Goods</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   Buy Airtime</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   Make VOOMA   withdrawals and deposits</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999983">   Link Any Bank Card</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   ATM withdrawal from your VOOMA  wallet</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   ATM Deposit into your VOOMA   account</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   Transfer funds to any Mobile Money wallet</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   Transfer funds to other Bank account from your VOOMA   wallet</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   Set Standing order</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   Scan and Pay</paragraph></section><heading>6.   Can I access VOOMA   services if I am not registered</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.040000000000006">Yes, when a VOOMA  registered customer sends you money as a non-registered customer,you</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.040000000000006">will receive a one-time Voucher, you will then visit the nearest KCB ATM, VOOMA   agent or any</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.040000000000006">KCB branch to withdraw your funds. For you to enjoy other additional services you will need to</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.040000000000006">register on VOOMA  .</paragraph></section></content>

2.page_content: <content><heading>7.   Do I need to be a KCB Bank account holder to access VOOMA   services?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">No, you do not need to have a KCB Bank account, to access VOOMA   services, however you will</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">have a lower limit, to upgrade your limits, you will have to visit the nearest KCB Branch with</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">your original National  ID and have an existing bank account to have a higher limit.</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">For a limit upgrade you will also need to be a KCB-Mpesa customer for the last 6 months.</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">See the table below; Daily Wallet Limit</paragraph></section><heading>Customer Onboarding on VOOMA</heading><section><subheading>Service Provider  Activation Stage</subheading><subheading>Daily</subheading><subheading>Wallet</subheading><subheading>Limit</subheading><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.000000000000057">Dial *844# / Download KCB</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">VOOMA   app  Self-Registration  100,000</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Visit KCB Branch</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Provide your</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">National ID  250,000</paragraph><subheading>KCB-Mpesa Customer</subheading><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">KCB-Mpesa</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Verification  250,000</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Visit KCB Branch and have an Active</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">KCB Account</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Provide your</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Linked at Branch  1,000,000</paragraph></section><heading>8.   What of my VOOMA Daily transactional Limit? How much is it ? You will be eligible as a registered</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">customer to transact at KES 100,000 per transactions</paragraph></section><heading>9.   Can is send money to unregistered customer? And are there restrictions to how much they can</heading><section><subheading>receive?  Yes you can Send Money to Unregistered customers however Unregistered customer can</subheading><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">only have a maximum of 2 vouchers in a Month. Monthly limit is KES 50,000</paragraph></section><heading>10.   What is the difference between Wallet Limit and Transaction limit?  Wallet Limit is the amount of</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Money your VOOMA wallet can hold at any given time. Transaction limit is how much you can</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">transact in your wallet e.g. Send Money/Make a Payment. Example: Tom wants to send KES</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">1,000,000 to his friend, Tom will need to send 5 sets of transactions in the day. And send another 5</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999992">sets the following day.</paragraph></section><heading>11.   Can I have more than one VOOMA   wallet</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999992">Yes. 3 is the maximum number of wallets you can have on VOOMA</paragraph></section><heading>12.   What are the benefits of having a VOOMA   Wallet</heading><section><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   Convenience</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   Speed</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.039999999999992">   Access to more payment services</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.040000000000001">   Ability to validate payments before completing a transactions</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.040000000000001">   Access to Loans and Savings</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.040000000000006">   Privacy</paragraph><paragraph font="Symbol" size="11.040000000000006">   One stop shop for all your payment needs</paragraph></section></content>

3.page_content: <content><heading>13. size="11.039999999999964">-Airtime purchase</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">-Payment of loans</paragraph><subheading>Deposits:  Customer can deposit at a KCB agent, a KCB branch, KCB ATM, Linked account, M-PESA  paybill</subheading><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">and a T-Kash wallet</paragraph></section><heading>15.   Does the Voucher I receive while making an ATM/Branch withdrawal expire?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Yes. Your  voucher expires in 10 minutes</paragraph></section><heading>16.   Where can I find VOOMA   charges for VOOMA   services</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">The charges for each service will be displayed to you before you can confirm the transaction.</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Charges will also be displayed at an Agent outlet</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Chargers will also be made public via Online media</paragraph></section><heading>17.   Does the wallet have any limits</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Yes the wallet has limits as per the table below.</paragraph></section><heading>VOOMA   LIMITS</heading><section><subheading>Service Provider  Activation Stage</subheading><subheading>Proposed</subheading><subheading>Limits</subheading><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">P2P to Unregistered User</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Send to a non-</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">registered user.  50,000</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">On *844# /KCB VOOMA   app  Self-Registration  100,000</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Customer who has Visited KCB</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Branch</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Provide your</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">National ID  250,000</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Customer Who has Visited KCB</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Branch and have an Active KCB</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Account</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Provide your</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="12.0">Linked at Branch  1,000,000</paragraph></section><heading>18.   What are the transaction limits</heading><section /></content>

7.page_content: <content><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Each transaction has a minimum of Kenya Shillings 1 and a maximum of Kenya Shillings 250,000.</paragraph></section><heading>19.   Is there a requirement to have a minimum balance?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">The wallet has zero minimum balance, you can transact as long as there is money in your wallet.</paragraph></section><heading>20.   How do I know that my transaction is successful?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">You will get a confirmation message after every transaction. You can also carry out a balance</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">enquiry.</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">In some payment transactions the service provider will also notify you.</paragraph></section><heading>21.   Will I be able to send money to my KCB account or accounts in other banks</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Yes.</paragraph></section><heading>22.   Will I be able to move money from my linked card into my VOOMA   wallet.</heading><section><subheading>Yes you will be able to Move money from your linked card into your VOOMA   ,</subheading><subheading>Dial *844# select pay menu, select send money, select send money to VOOMA  , follow the prompts to</subheading><subheading>complete transaction</subheading></section><heading>23.   How can I locate a VOOMA   agent / merchant</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">All our registered VOOMA   agents / merchants will be branded with VOOMA   Sticker.</paragraph></section><heading>24.   What services can I access at a VOOMA   agent ;</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">You can register for VOOMA  , withdraw as a Non VOOMA   Customer, Withdraw as a VOOMA</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Customer, deposit funds in your VOOMA   account, or pay your bills. (Buy KPLC Tokens, Pay KPLC</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">prepaid, Dstv, GoTv, Zuku Satellite, Zuku Phone, Zuku Tripple Play, Star times, Nairobi Water,</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">NHIF Individual, KCB Insurance agency and JamboJet )</paragraph></section><heading>25.   Are there other billers apart from the above named?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri,Italic" size="11.039999999999964">Yes.On your USSD Menu we have billers that you will need to enter Paybill numbers</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri,Italic" size="11.039999999999964">Go to VOOMA   Paybill then select Enter Paybill number, proceed to enter the respective biller</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri,Italic" size="11.039999999999964">numbers, see biller numbers below.</paragraph><subheading>Channel/APP</subheading><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999992">*844#  NHIF Individual  530101</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999992">*844#  NHIF Corporate  530100</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999992">*844#  Nyeri Water  968800</paragraph></section><heading>26.   What happens when I lose my phone / phone number?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.040000000000006">Call our Contact our contact centre or visit any KCB branch to inform them of the loss</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.040000000000006">immediately. However your money is safe since all transaction need your PIN authorization.</paragraph></section><heading>27.   What happens when I change my phone / phone number?</heading><section /></content>

8.page_content: <content><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Call our Contact our contact centre or visit any KCB branch to inform them of the change</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">immediately.</paragraph></section><heading>28.   What do I do if I forget my PIN?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">You can reset your PIN from your account menu and select reset PIN.</paragraph></section><heading>29.   Will I be able to link my KCB bank account to a VOOMA   wallet?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Yes. You must Visit a KCB branch for your account to be linked</paragraph></section><heading>30.   Can I add beneficiaries to my VOOMA   wallet</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">Yes.  Both Merchants and Customers can be added as beneficiaries.</paragraph></section><heading>31.   What are beneficiaries?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">A beneficiary is anyone you pay frequently on USSD or APP</paragraph></section><heading>32.   Can I use my VOOMA   wallet outside of Kenya?</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">No, the services are currently available only in Kenya.</paragraph></section><heading>33.   What are the contact centre helplines</heading><section><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">CALL: 0711 087000 or 0732 187000</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">EMAIL: ccentreinternal@kcbgroup.com</paragraph><paragraph font="ABCDEE+Calibri" size="11.039999999999964">SMS 22522</paragraph></section></content>
